title: If You Love Me, Come Find Me.: The Story of How I Found Myself in Small Bits of Joie de Vivre in All the Gin Joints in All the Towns in All the World.
description: One girl's moment in time of finding herself and her joie de vivre in all the gin joints in all the towns in all the world. A coming-of-age memoir entailing joy, love, friends, family, mental health, travel, food, and the occasional bad joke and/or decision.
author: Margaret  Dempsey
